Key Match Events: Ishan Kishan scored 89 runs off 56 balls.
Shreyas Iyer scored 57 runs off 28 balls.
Rohit Sharma scored 44 runs off 32 balls.
Bhuvneshwar Kumar took 2 wickets for 9 runs.
Venkatesh Iyer took 2 wickets for 36 runs.
Yuzvendra Chahal took 1 wicket for 11 runs.
Ravindra Jadeja took 1 wicket for 28 runs.
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka won the toss and elected to field first.
Post-Match Reflections: Ishan Kishan was named Player of the Match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium, Lucknow.
Deepak Hooda made his T20I debut.
